name: Ventricular diameters
description: Measurements of the maximum diameters of the right and left ventricles of the heart.

attributes.name: right ventricle diameter
attributes.description: Maximum right ventricular diameter measured in millimeters.

attributes.name: left ventricle diameter
attributes.description: Maximum left ventricular diameter measured in millimeters.

attributes.name: rv/lv ratio
attributes.description: Ratio of right ventricle diameter to left ventricle diameter.
